title: Do you like going to bars? What kind of bars do you prefer?

korean: 나는 가끔 친구들이랑 바에 가는 걸 좋아해.
칵테일 바나 와인 바 같은 데 자주 가.
분위기 좋고 조명이 은은한 곳이 좋아.
음악도 너무 크지 않고 적당한 곳.
바텐더가 만들어주는 시그니처 칵테일 마시는 게 재밌어.
너무 비싸지 않으면서 분위기 좋은 곳이 베스트야.
친구들이랑 편하게 얘기하면서 스트레스 푸는 시간이야.
english: I sometimes like going to bars with friends.
I mainly go on Friday evenings or weekends.
I prefer quiet bars rather than noisy clubs.
I like drinking while having conversations.
I often go to places like cocktail bars or wine bars.
I like places with a good atmosphere and soft lighting.
Places where the music isn't too loud, just moderate.
I mainly drink cocktails rather than beer.
It's fun to drink signature cocktails made by the bartender.
I prefer places that offer a variety of snacks.
A place with a good atmosphere that's not too expensive is the best.
It's time to relieve stress while comfortably chatting with friends.
